description: Helpers for Hive Keychain signature requests (signBuffer, customJson, transfer, etc.)

methods.name: requestSignBuffer
methods.description: Request a signature of an arbitrary string/buffer using Hive Keychain.

methods.name: requestCustomJson
methods.description: Request a custom_json operation signature and broadcast via Hive Keychain.

methods.name: requestTransfer
methods.description: Request a transfer operation signature and broadcast via Hive Keychain.

usage:
keychainHelpers.requestSignBuffer('user', 'string', callback)
keychainHelpers.requestCustomJson('user', {...}, 'id', 'Sign this?', callback)
keychainHelpers.requestTransfer('user', 'to', '1.000', 'memo', 'HIVE', callback)
